name: Trailblazers Foundation
briefDescription: We are based in Thane. We develop and execute CSR projects as per the clients need. Apart from CSR projects we do self funded philanthropic activities like Blood Donation, Cleanliness and Awareness Campaigns.Multiply the Message is our ongoing project from past 6 years for Dow Chemical International in which we have trained about 3000 teachers to teach environment in fun way. A short film on this project was nominated among the best 10 videos in Boston Film Festival.We also designed project PEACE for P&G company which won Best CSR programme in 1998.Currently we have adopted a group grampanchayat comprised of 5 villages for development in Thane District.
